Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: Riddler \Rid"dler\, n. One who riddles (grain, sand, etc.). [1913 Webster]

Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: Riddler \Rid"dler\, n. One who speaks in, or propounds, riddles. [1913 Webster]
